channel.title: I need online help
channel.description: ok look i got a sever i got a client and you have to download them to play but when ppl download them it dont work a screen comes up for 1 minute then goes down even when i keep the sever on whats the problem?

item.title: I need online help
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

lol im telling ya man, utorrent isnt the way to portforward. its like a last resort, when all else fails. utorrent is a trump card, it only works to a certain point.

Read full topic

item.title: I need online help
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Try to use a different source, and a different client (i recommend homiescape, use that client & source). Just to test that your server is indeed online, because it might not even be 100% portforwarded (its happen to a friend of mine before, people said they could get on but the client didnt work, turned out he didnt portforward correctly, once he did they could login and stuff, so check that out.

1.) Download a homiescape source & client
2.) Run the homiescape server
3.) Let them see if its online

If they still cannot connect, then you did not portforward correctly. If they can then you know the problem is your source/client.

Read full topic
